name: Spin the ball - Basketball Game Retro
name_original: Spin the ball - Basketball Game Retro
description:
Swipe to spin the ball.

You may find it tricky at first until you find the right angle and rhythm - but keep at it and you will soon be a basketball king!

Once you've got the ball up to speed, you should be able to take a break and then carry on, to allow you to keep going and going... but don't wait too long all the ball will fall!

** [ HOW TO PLAY ] **

Swipe the ball to get it spinning.
Master the right rate to keep it spinning.
Don't let it drop

** [ Features ] **

Retro classic 8 bit graphics
Touch swipe to spin the basketball
Game Leaderboard to challenge your friends
Funky sound track
